subject: Extortion and Blackmail
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors say Karen Sypher, convicted of trying to extort Louisville Coach Rick Pitino, sought at least $2.5 million and potentially more than $7 million.
snippet: Prosecutors say Karen Sypher, convicted of trying to extort Louisville Coach Rick Pitino, sought at least $2.5 million and potentially more than $7 million.
